DOC.brief_summary: Our study 's principle purpose determine whether decrease wait time see antenatal care increase demand use antenatal care service Mozambique .
DOC.brief_title: Waiting Time . Wasting Time : A Randomized Control Trial Investigate Health Impacts Improving Quality Antenatal Care Mozambique
DOC.detailed_description: This protocol describe pilot study test impact schedule intervention intend reduce wait time antenatal care . The study include one intervention health clinic one control clinic Maputo , Mozambique . In intervention facility woman attend antenatal care inform return schedule date time see within one hour clinic staff rather wait indefinite amount time see care . Appointment card clip ANC card , collect routine health data keep woman end ANC visit . Health facility staff train identify woman return scheduled time manage patient flow schedule woman receive quickly . After start date intervention , woman attend ANC health facility provide schedule return date time window . Baseline endline exit interview survey conduct intervention control facility compare change wait time , number ANC visit , provider satisfaction course study period clinic .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion individual study participant enrol delivery : 1 . Women deliver health facility week recruitment Inclusion criterion woman whose wait time measure : 1 . Women health facility seek care antenatal care another reproductive health service ( anticipate total enrollment 800 woman ) Inclusion criterion health care provider survey provider 1 . Have work health facility least 6 month 2 . The health care worker provide ANC part routine duty ( anticipate total enrollment 4 health care worker ) Exclusion criterion individual study participant enrol delivery : 1 . Women 18 year age exclude 2 . Women whose baby die labor childbirth delivery exit interview There exclusion criterion sample woman whose wait time measure There exclusion criterion health care provider survey
